panels.description: rate of requests in seconds at X percentile
panels.title: Percentile

panels.description: Number of active consumers (should match number of replicas, may not indicate they are actively consuming depending on partition count)

panels.description: Number of messages remaining in topic to be processed
panels.title: Msgs in Queue

panels.description: How long since last rebalance occurred
panels.title: Last Rebalance

panels.description: Messages are committed in batches of ~10. Lag up to 10 messages can be expected
panels.title: Kafka Lag (messages)

panels.description: Captures how many rebalance events have occurred over set interval
panels.title: Rebalance Events

panels.description: Errors related to the Consumer and not message processing
panels.title: Consumer Error Rate

panels.description: Recent Kafka Error Event Messages Processed
panels.title: Kafka Error Events

panels.description: Lag from point where resource is written to outbox table, to consumed and processed by inventory consumer
panels.title: End to end replication lag
